name: Cargo! The Quest for Gravity
description: Create crazy, yet functional, custom vehicles to solve missions with your own unique style!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/Windows Vista/Windows XP Processor: Pentium 4 3GHz or equivalent AMD Athlon processor Memory: 1GB XP / 2GB Vista Hard Disk Space: At least 4 GB of Space Video Card: 128 MB or more, DirectX 9-compatible with support for Pixel Shader 2.0 (ATI Radeon X800 / NVIDIA GeForce 7600 / Intel GMA HD Graphics) DirectX®: Enhanced for DirectX 9.0 Sound: DirectX 9.0c compatible

reviews.review_text: weird game. really weird. but very fun too. if you can look past the jankiness and incoherent story and just go with it, it's a fun game. making vehicles and making the physics break.
Good game, almost perfect for children and... it's Ice Pick Lodge!
this game just cured 5 months of depression 10/10

Kick naked elves, engineer flying contraptions, and find random triggers in a laggy fashion while you play this game!  10/10 I got multiple game breaking glitches and the game does not tell you what to do enough.  Also the last few achievements are stupid.
Comparable to an even more surreal Banjo Kazooie: Nuts and Bolts. The vehicle handling isn't always the best but the atmosphere, charm, and endless puns make up for it in spades.

This is a game worth playing just by virtue of how bizarre its premise is.  Don't get me wrong, there's legitimate fun to be had here; the gameplay is basically just building custom vehicles to solve tasks (Think a simpler spiritual-predecessor to Besiege. Or Banjo Kazooey Nuts and Bolts' except that no one's beloved franchise was ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ized in the making of Cargo!) and I genuinely found it fun to drive around the vehicles I had built or go out of my way to find the least-obvious way to accomplish my tasks..  But the game world and the characters populating it are WEIRD, like something from a dream when you've eaten a whole pizza before bed. I'm talking island gods consisting of giant mechanical masks on rails, and dancing, naked, man-faced babies that explode into fireworks if you cause them to have 'too much fun'.  (and weird is a good thing)

This game felt like it had potential, up until the point where it utterly sucked. Which was the first 2 minutes of the game. You crash land on an island filled with masked gods (Which have the longest, most annoying, and out of context conversations) and small man babies that you can kick around the island for some kind of point system. The objective of the game is to rechieve enough pieces from your blimp to rebuild it and fly off the god for sacken island. From what the trailer and images showed is that it is a sandbox adventure game in which you can create various aircrafts and boats to do various tasks with. But from the gameplay it shows that you have to pay in game currency for parts of the ships and it took me the two hours of playing this game to figure out how to activate the building sequence. Horrific voice acting, terrible and slow gameplay, and aweful game mechanics. Not even worth the two dollars I paid for this piece of crap on a Steam sale. -100000000/10
Weird, psychedelic and fun :)
This is the perfect game to have a blast of fun and relax Everything is just so silly

All of my wats belong to this.  But, seriously. You walk around kicking tiny, naked, genital-less midgets in their very round asses to gain 'fun' while a couple of schitzo masks insult you.  The point of the game is that Earth has lost gravity, only these midgets still exist, and you can restore mass by collecting fun from the midgets. Their idea of fun is getting kicked around, jumping into high speed fans and getting pulverized, etc.   If you like games that make almost no sense in our world, are kind of confusing even in their world, and is based on immature and sometimes inappropriate humor, then yes I recommend it.  If you value your time and money, no.

i'v bought this game cus it looked cool in youtube vids, boy this was a waste of my money. looks cool but played like a brick, boring as hell and very confusing 'this might be the goal of the game, to be confusing', personally i don't like this.
Worst game of all time!

BEFORE YOU EVEN THINK ABOUT BUYNG THIS GAME, RECONSIDER IT!! DON'T!!!!!  this game is missing the simplest of game structures, it has the worst tutorial, actually it dosen't even have one, and it has no good tips-button if you get lost (like that ever happens since it's a ♥♥♥♥ing small island) or don't listen to what the story dudes say. btw; the voice-acting and the story-line is just terrible, it tries to ryme, have a good rythm, and be funny, but it dosen't even hit one of thos spots. THE GAME IS JUST TERRIBLE...  I have played the game in 0.3 hours and found out all of this, imagine what you find out on 4 hours (which is the estimated story-time of this game).  BTW: it's buggy  ps. don't buy this game unless you are ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ or rich, I won this game on steamgifts, and I want my points back!!!!
Wow, that's all I can really say. Fun, fun, strange times.
This game is so weird! But intriguing. The graphics are gorgeous and the whole building-things portion is interesting. The story is...odd. Anyway it's definitely worth a look!

This. Is. Perfect. Perfect amount of nonsense in a sort of believeable way. Loving it, buying this for friends!  Even though the game sometimes has an unfinished feel because of the lack of a map, objectivelist and navigator for drowning buddies It's a nice game to play. I had a ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ of fun building stuff from scratch! If the maker's would have just put a tiny little more time in it though it would've been even better.

I can't believe this exists. The entire game is just a giant mind♥♥♥♥ meant to be played stoned out of your ♥♥♥♥ing mind or something. Even if your senses are clear, you really won't have a clue wtf is going on as you sit and watch your entire reality shatter around you.

Is Cargo more than an interesting diversion? Probably not. But, I did enjoy it and found what some found to be failings(IE, the vehicle handling) to be part of the charm.. And it is the most accessable Ice-Pick Lodge game.
Love this game, very creative, funny theme, get to build/customize your own boat to save a funny world of expoding midgets :p
A lot of fun, but really REALLY REAAAALLLLLY buggy
